Package bank

Class Summary
Account This class manages details about a single bank account.
Bank This class collects and manipulates a set of Accounts stored in an array.
 

Exception Summary
AccountExistsException An exception class used at the time of adding a new account to the bank.
NoMoreAccountsException An exception class used to notify that the array of accounts is full.
NotFoundException An exception class used to notify of a failed attempt to find an account in the bank.
OverdraftException An exception class used to notify of an attempt to exceed the overdraft limit on an account.
